OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This IP is used to create order members for given Ids. It internally fetches related service accounts and create order members from accounts.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: CreateCartMembersFromAssets

omniProcessElements.name: createCartMembers
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "AccountToOrderMemberFieldMap" : { "vlocity_cmt__BillingEmailAddress__c" : "vlocity_cmt__Email__c", "Id" : "vlocity_cmt__ServiceAccountId__c", "Name" : "Name", "RecordTypeId" : "vlocity_cmt__MemberType__c", "ShippingCity" : "vlocity_cmt__City__c", "ShippingCountry" : "vlocity_cmt__Country__c", "ShippingPostalCode" : "vlocity_cmt__PostalCode__c", "ShippingState" : "vlocity_cmt__State__c", "ShippingStreet" : "vlocity_cmt__StreetAddress__c" } }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "vlocity_cmt.B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "createCartMembersFromAssets", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
